content.query:
Use [Clients]
GO
SELECT 
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.resourceType') as resourceType,
    doc
from OPENROWSET
(
    BULK 'abfss://medstarrfpdatalakefs@medstarrfpdatalakeeastus.dfs.core.windows.net/clients/raw/true/2021/11/11/Blake449_Swift555_fd4fb1ee-3f68-fd42-0610-07f1bfe9b708.json',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
) WITH 
(
    doc varchar(MAX) 
) as rows

-- test remove all spaces
